about_the_game:
The plot of The Three Kingdoms of Heaven is an aerial history, because the Yellow Emperor defeated Chiyou in ancient times, and sealed it deep in the earth, at the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, the court collapsed, the group of men and up, natural disasters continue, the people displaced, at this time the dragon King to save the world, to take out the dragon ball buried in the depths of the dragon palace to stop the flood, do not want to touch the seal of Chiyou, Chiyou took this opportunity to divide 108 spirits to escape the place, and possessed themselves among the various forces so that one of them could one day collect the spirits of the other 107 generals and be reborn.

The game contains a rich home affairs system, the use of exploration instructions in the home affairs stage in addition to the general can be found, but also to obtain a variety of items, which increase the props of new recruits and loyalty treasures, as well as increase the ability of equipment.

In addition to the internal affairs system, the game also contains a rich martial arts cultivation system, including talent selection. Add more power. You can make whatever warrior you want. Technology research and development system. From siege equipment to aircraft cannons, only the people involved are intelligent. Thus changing the situation of the war, control the situation of the world.

An excellent diplomatic system can alienate and co-opt the opposing military generals to become Party B's camp, so as to subdue the enemy without fighting.

After the end of the command to enter the map strategy stage, the time on the map is not always passing, only after the execution of all the current instructions, the time will change, the player can choose the action of the military generals in their own city, the military generals can form a team of up to 8 people, the battle can choose the formation and command the military generals action, because the enemy's formation is random, Therefore, the rational use of formations is crucial to the victory of the battle.

In addition to gaining access to the opposing city, the battle also captured the opposing general, who would be imprisoned in the city's prison. Surrender and beheading can be carried out at any time. When the player has conquered all the power cities, 108 generals can be unlocked
God Chiyou resurrection plot, anyway unlock the world unity plot.
